summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of ABM & Asset Intelligence Layer. All core endpoints functional with strict consensus rules working as designed. System correctly rejects assets that don't meet 90% existence, 80% ownership, 5% fraud, and 70% risk thresholds.

minor_bugs.impact: Minor - error handling could be improved

consensus_behavior.observation: Strict thresholds (90% existence, 80% ownership, 5% fraud) cause most test assets to be rejected
consensus_behavior.impact: Expected behavior - system designed for high-quality assets only
consensus_behavior.note: This is correct functionality, not a bug

passed_tests: Individual result endpoints (oracle, abm, fraud, consensus, full)
Consensus rule evaluation with multiple scenarios
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Improve JSON parsing error handling to return 400 instead of 500 for malformed JSON requests. The consensus thresholds are working correctly - assets are being rejected as designed due to strict quality requirements (90% existence, 80% ownership, 5% fraud limits).
